    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v3

    Facet EncryptionToken_Summary

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v3:EncryptionToken_Summary

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<EncryptionToken authenticationMethod="SecurityCode" encryptedValue="5dfc52b51bd35553df8592078de921bc" encryptionKey="KHC32198gt4" encryptionKeyMethod="RotatingKeyEnvironment_DailyKey" encryptionMethod="Triple DES" mask="xxxxxxxxxxxx9922" token="AEGHV234AUD54367" tokenProviderID="Shift4 (payment)" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v3">
    <PlainText>Example String Value</PlainText>
    <Warning code="2" docURL="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" language="en" nodeList="Example String Value" recordID="Example String Value" shortText="Example String Value" status="Complete" statusExtension="status_Other_Value" tag="Example String Value" type="Advisory" typeExtension="type_Other_Value">Example String Value</Warning>
</EncryptionToken>

      Example JSON

      {
  "EncryptionToken" : {
    "encryptionKey" : "KHC32198gt4",
    "encryptionKeyMethod" : "RotatingKeyEnvironment_DailyKey",
    "encryptionMethod" : "Triple DES",
    "encryptedValue" : "5dfc52b51bd35553df8592078de921bc",
    "mask" : "xxxxxxxxxxxx9922",
    "token" : "AEGHV234AUD54367",
    "tokenProviderID" : "Shift4 (payment)",
    "authenticationMethod" : "SecurityCode",
    "PlainText" : "Example String Value",
    "Warning" : {
      "value" : "Example String Value",
      "language" : "en",
      "type" : "Advisory",
      "typeExtension" : "type_Other_Value",
      "shortText" : "Example String Value",
      "code" : "2",
      "docURL" : "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema",
      "tag" : "Example String Value",
      "recordID" : "Example String Value",
      "nodeList" : "Example String Value",
      "status" : "Complete",
      "statusExtension" : "status_Other_Value"
    }
  }
}

      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        PlainText
        Non-secure (plain text) value.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:string
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        Warning
        Identifies an error that occurred in the processing of the payment card.
        Details
        Type ErrorWarning
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        encryptionKey
        This contains a key required to retrieve the full payment instrument details compliant with PCI DSS standards.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:string
        Example Value KHC32198gt4
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        encryptionKeyMethod
        This contains a reference to the key generation method being used - this is NOT the key value.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:string
        Example Value RotatingKeyEnvironment_DailyKey
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        encryptionMethod
        When using the OpenTravel Encryption element, it is RECOMMENDED that all trading partners be informed of all encryption methods being used in advance of implementation to ensure message processing compatibility.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:string
        Example Value Triple DES
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        encryptedValue
        The value in an encrypted format.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:string
        Example Value 5dfc52b51bd35553df8592078de921bc
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        mask
        Masked data.
        Details
        Type EncryptionTokenTypeMask
        Example Value xxxxxxxxxxxx9922
        Required false
        Pattern [0-9a-zA-Z]{1,32}
        Max Occurrences 1
        token
        Tokenized Information.
        Details
        Type EncryptionTokenType_Token
        Example Value AEGHV234AUD54367
        Required false
        Pattern [0-9a-zA-Z]{1,32}
        Max Occurrences 1
        tokenProviderID
        This contains a provider ID if multiple providers are used for secure information exchange.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:string
        Example Value Shift4 (payment)
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        authenticationMethod
        Specifies the method that was used to authenticate the card.
        Details
        Type AuthenticationMethod_Enum
        Example Value SecurityCode
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
